* 0 - Units
* 3 - thousand
* 6 - million
* 9 - billion

* IND_WVB - non-US accounts
* IND - Corporate
* BNK - Banks
* IND_IT - Italy
* IND_REUTERS - US accounts
* IND_IT_DYNAMIC_MODEL - Italian national format dynamic model
* INS - Insurance companies
* UNIVERSAL - All templates

FX.description:

* AtLastClosingDate - AtLastClosingDate
* MyRates - MyRates

* Estimate - Estimate
* LBound - LBound
* UBound - UBound

FirstLevelMinimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage for BO at first level must be between 5% and 100%

FurtherLevelsMinimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage for BO at any level must be between 5% and 100%

TopShareholdersWithUnknownPercentage.description: Consider individuals at the top with an unknown percentage as beneficial owner

TopShareholdersWithFirstLevelMinimumPerc.description:
Consider individuals at the top with minimum percentage at first level and with either minimum percentage at further levels or 100% at further levels.

Enum Description


* FollowingPathDefinition - FollowingPathDefinition
* Path100Percent - Path100Percent

UnidentifiedShareholders.description: I consider a company to be an Ultimate Owner if it has no identified shareholders or if its shareholder's percentages are not known.

HighestQuoted.description: I want the highest quoted company to be considered the Ultimate Owner.

Companies.WhereObject.description: The definition of a complex search. There is one unique property possible. Each property correspond to one type of search.

oneOf.description: An id or an array of ids
An id or an array of ids
An array of Where.Text associated with a boolean AND operation

A single string is treated in two way:
1. If the last charter is an asterix(wildcard) 
  Then we match every text that **start with** the input
2. No wildcard
  We match only **whole word*
> Note that if the input contains many words separated by **space** we will match that exact phrases
> No case sensitive search is possible

Where.Text.description: Define a way to find words/phrases in data

And.description: boolean operator **and** applied on the array of object. The text will match **all** of the words/sub expression

Or.description: boolean operator **or** applied on the array of object.The text will match **any** of the words / sub expression

Not.description: boolean operator **not** applied on the array of object.The text will match **none** of the words/sub expression

Where.TextExpression.description: Change the logical association between words.
